response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and interests. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success and well-being.

Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between fair market valuation and a competitive edge, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or address any concerns you might have. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
